item.description:
Hi Packers,

We hope you had a great Thanksgiving and everyone was safe where ever you were traveling to. Their were some good football games last Thursday but today is the return of the Pack and we will take on the Giants in New York, as usual we will be meet at the Banshee for 8pm, game will kick off at 8.20pm. In past seasons we have not got the best turnout for Sunday night games especially after the Thanksgiving holiday, so if you could, please RSVP so we can advise the staff to serve you better. All suggestions and comments are always welcome.

GO PACK.

Ray Butler

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Packers @ Giants
